titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 481: Șerh-i Hizbü'n-Nevevî

licence.#text: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 481: Șerh-i Hizbü'n-Nevevî are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. msContents.summary: Commentary on a prayer [Ḥizb] of al-Nawawī with introduction, possibly by Müstakimzade Süleyman Sadeddin.

supportDesc.extent: i, 46, i leaves : 150 x 100 (100 x 60) mm, bound to 150 x 105 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed.

decoNote: Illuminated headpiece (f. 1r); textblock border-ruled in gold; rubrications in red.

binding.p: Brown leather over pasteboard with flap (Type II); gilt-stamped central mandorla with four pendants and frame; pink paper doublure, silver sprinkled endleaves.

origin.p: The item is undated; possibly 18th century.
